author: zach-folwick
body: Not sure if the same process works in windows VSCode, or if that's redundant since user would be using Visual Studio.  If this is relevant to Windows debugging experience, I'd suggest putting this text somewhere more neutral.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @zach-folwick for documentation updates, use `[skip ci]` anywhere in the commit message to skip ci. This failure on appvayr is due to the bug #638

comments.author: zach-folwick
comments.body: @vors - this should fail appveyor again... forgot to add that tag.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
You get lucky :)
Please re-trigger the build, if you see failure due to this bug.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @zach-folwick I'll cherry pick your change into #657.

title: Update README.md with VSCode debug instructions.
